tensors_in.check: scales->ndim == 1 && scales->len == src->ndim, "the number of elements of `scales` should be the same as the rank of input `src`."
tensors_in.custom:
for (int i = 0; i < scales->len; i++)
     ln_opck_tensor_satisfy_msg(((float *)scales->data)[i] >= 1, "`scales` takes values >= 1")
